words.source: KJV (put forth), NASB (reached out), NET (reached out); wayyišləḥû, conjunction + 3mp qal imperfect consecutive of šillaḥ
KJV, NASB, ESV, NET; hāʾănāšîm, article + plural noun ʾănāšîm (the angels/men inside)
standard Hebrew particle ʾet (accusative marker); KJV, NASB, ESV (implied)
KJV (their hand), NASB (their hands), NET; yādām, noun yād + 3mp suffix
KJV (pulled), NASB (brought), ESV (brought); wayyāḇîʾû, conjunction + 3mp hiphil imperfect consecutive of bôʾ
standard Hebrew particle ʾet (accusative marker); KJV, NASB, ESV (implied)
proper name Lôṭ; KJV, NASB, ESV
KJV (into), NASB (into), NET (to them); ʾălêhem, preposition ʾel + 3mp suffix
KJV (into the house), NASB (into the house), NET; habbāyəṯāh, article + noun bayit + directional -āh
wəʾeṯ, conjunction + accusative marker; KJV, NASB, ESV (and)
KJV (the door), NASB (the door), ESV; haddēlet, article + noun dēlet
KJV (shut), NASB (shut), ESV; sāḡārû, 3mp qal perfect of sāḡar
